scripts.test: lerna --stream --scope @essex/network-navigator run test && lerna run test --stream --ignore @essex/network-navigator
scripts.test:powerbi: lerna --stream --scope @essex/network-navigator run test && lerna run test --stream --scope @essex/network-navigator-powerbi
scripts.postinstall: lerna exec --concurrency=1 -- yarn && lerna exec --concurrency=99 -- linklocal --named @essex/network-navigator ../network-navigator
